thread.title: Tour de France route good for defending champion Froome
thread.title_full: Tour de France route good for defending champion Froome

title: Tour de France route good for defending champion Froome
text: > Sports Tour de France route good for defending champion Froome This photo provided by ASO (Amaury Sport Organisation) and released on Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, shows the official map of the 2016 Tour de France cycling race.The route for next year's Tour de France should suit the all-around riding skills of defending champion Chris Froome. The 3,519-kilometer (2,186-mile) trek will scale the Pyrenees before the Alps, just as the Tour did this year, again going counter-clockwise around France. (ASO via AP Photo) MADATORY CREDIT
